description: a(n+1)=a(n)-F(n) if >0, else a(n)+F(n), where F() are Fibonacci numbers.
formula: a(n) = 0, if n = 0; F(n-1)+1, if n == 0 (mod 3); F(n)+1, if n == 1 (mod 3): 1, if n == 2 (mod 3). - _David W. Wilson_For n>=1, a(n) = F(0)<+>F(1)<+>...<+>F(n-1), where operation <+> is defined in comment in A245618. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Nov 05 2014Empirical g.f.: -x^2*(2*x^6-x^4+7*x^3-2*x^2-x-1) / ((x-1)*(x^2+x-1)*(x^4-x^3+2*x^2+x+1)). - _Colin Barker_, Nov 06 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
